statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM equipment_maintenance
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_id = 1
SELECT equipment_name FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_schedule LIKE '%monthly%'
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name FROM equipment_maintenance ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC
SELECT * FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE maintenance_schedule LIKE '%monthly%' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, DATE_FORMAT(last_maintenance_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS last_maintenance FROM equipment_maintenance ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_name FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_name LIKE '%generator%' OR equipment_name LIKE '%pump%' ORDER BY equipment_name;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_schedule FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE last_maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' AND last_maintenance_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_schedule IS NOT NULL;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM Equipment WHERE maintenance_schedule LIKE '%monthly%';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceHistory ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC, last_maintenance_date ASC
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 3
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive' GROUP BY maintenance_type
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM Equipment INNER JOIN MaintenanceHistory ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceHistory.equipment_id
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM Equipment LEFT JOIN MaintenanceHistory ON Equipment.equipment_id = MaintenanceHistory.equipment_id
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM equipment WHERE maintenance_schedule < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_history ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, technician_name FROM equipment e JOIN maintenance_history mh ON e.equipment_id = mh.equipment_id JOIN technicians t ON mh.technician_name = t.technician_name;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_schedule FROM equipment WHERE maintenance_schedule > '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, last_maintenance FROM equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance DESC;
SELECT e.equipment_id, e.equipment_name, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_type FROM equipment e JOIN maintenance_history m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id;

SELECT e.equipment_name, COUNT(m.maintenance_date) AS maintenance_count FROM equipment e JOIN maintenance_history m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id GROUP BY e.equipment_name HAVING maintenance_count > 3;
SELECT * FROM equipment
SELECT name, model, purchase_date FROM equipment
SELECT equipment_id, name FROM equipment WHERE model = 'HP'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY frequency DESC, maintenance_type
SELECT technician_id, name, specialty FROM technician
SELECT * FROM equipment
SELECT name, model FROM equipment ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT equipment_id, serial_number, purchase_date FROM equipment WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule JOIN equipment ON maintenance_schedule.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id
SELECT history_id, maintenance_date, technician FROM maintenance_history WHERE technician = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM robots ORDER BY robot_name DESC;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, manufacturer FROM robots WHERE manufacturer='Tech Co';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%cleaning%';
SELECT robot_id, purchase_date FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NULL;
SELECT technician_name, technician_specialty FROM technicians ORDER BY technician_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM robots;
SELECT robot_id, robot_name, manufacturer FROM robots WHERE maintenance_schedule > 5;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM robots ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT m.log_id, r.robot_name, m.maintenance_date, m.technician_name FROM maintenance_logs m JOIN robots r ON m.robot_id = r.robot_id;

SELECT h.history_id, h.robot_id, h.maintenance_type, h.maintenance_cost, r.robot_name, e.equipment_name FROM maintenance_history h JOIN robots r ON h.robot_id = r.robot_id JOIN equipment e ON e.robot_id = r.robot_id;
